segments.text: Wow, what a sight in this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's there by the sink, apron tied, drying a plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the faucet to be running like that, overflowing the whole basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring down the front, making a mess on the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her foot in the puddleâ€”how has she not noticed?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems so careless, that water just wasting away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, to the side, a boy's on a stool that's clearly about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, maybe to steady himself or catch crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands below, arm extended, waiting for a cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off this cookie heist right behind the adult's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene through the window, totally at odds with inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away; it's like a comedy of errors unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, turn off that water before it's too late!
segments.speaker: PAR
